Articles.Content: 1283: A big archive of kraken victims, attacks, and several posters of roverdude with the headline: Super dedicated moder or secret kraken spy?
1284: A Mun landing movie set.
1285: A how-to guide on how to cover up fake Mun Landings.
1286: a notification stating that the gift shop and exit are on floor 1337
1287: two million, five hundred thousand tons of spinning metal, all alone in the night.
1288: One big room with the whole kerbal population (Accept for the kerbalnauts) stuffed together in a big group hug.
1289: The Koylent Green factory.
1290: The room where all the robots scream at you.

1291: the walls are covered in maps of Laythe, with an emphasis on that one island which looks like the skeleton of some giant lizard. In the center of the room is a table with a single, giant scale lying under a magnifying glass.
1292: You see a half painted Mars set.
1293: You see a room full of animators making a CGI Mars set.
1294: You see the derpy blackbird from floor 900andsomething riding a Sputnik probe powered by a fire extinguisher.
1295: The Stanley Parable Adventure Line passes through this floor. You follow it up the stairs to the next.

1296: You see a sign that says, "Warning: structural integrity compromised beyond this point"
You see another that says, "No atmospheric pressure beyond this point."
1297: It's raining tacos!
1298: A space train station to go to the ISS as well as free spacesuits and Jeb constantly orbiting this really, really really tall building.

1299: A sign pointing up the stairs says: "You are almost there!" Trouble is, there's at least twenty different sets of stairs. Edited November 27, 2015 by cubinator
clarification
1300: you turn a round around a count and lost the ways for the next stages

1301: You begin to float. You see a taco truck...

[COLOR="silver"][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]

I love tacos...

1302: Daleks. Daleks everywhere. Luckily, they seem to be playing KSP and don't notice you.

COMPLETELY USELESS REVELATION: Daleks=Evil converted astromech droids?!?!?!

 

Edited November 30, 2015 by cubinator
1303: 34 floors from floor 1337
1304: An oven in the middle of the room. There is a pie in it.

1305:

You walk in as a human, but you quickly become a Kerbal. The process was painful.

1306:

You see Valentina Kerman twerking.
1307: A large rectangular pit filled with hydric acid.
